about_the_game:
Listen to Sniper Fury’s full soundtrack anyplace, anytime, on the device of your choice.

All 24 original tracks are available now to download from Steam.

Enjoy the vibrant compositions that transport you back to the first Regions, your favorite event, or the most ruthless clan battles, wherever you may be!

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

name: Sniper Fury - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 170 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 460 MB available space

short_description: Rediscover the electric strums and strong beats of power that rocked your way to mission success in Sniper Fury. Download tracks now!
